title: Browsing the boards at work like:

replies.body:
.....
I just realized something..
How old is Laughing Fish?

And just how long is a Fish's life span....

Oh no....

I'm worried now...

And is he a fresh water fish?
no....
he can't be...

Def salt water, or he'd be dead already

Well, I looked it up and a Silverfish's lifespan is 2-8 years.

http://gif-finder.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Michael-Richards-Oh-no.gif

And how old are you o_O... (acc not literal?) (Or literal? idk)

(You Will be Missed)

Well my account is over 2 years old now...

https://media.tenor.co/images/9a220ea175d62e55c7044d7f5abbb2c2/tenor.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XptGoeGk,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-29T15:57:11.773+0000)
>
> Mine is 3, so...

Oh yeah....well...uh....I played in closed Alpha. So there.
I TAKE ORDERS FROM NO ONE!

...

Poor laughing fish

*Aside*
SOMEONE GET THE LEMONS!
And the salt.... And the pepper.... And maybe the tarter sauce?
*End Aside*

Seriously though...
Arn't silverfish insects???

;O

WHAT ARE YOU!
A FISH OR A BUG!
Laughing Fish is not a person, but rather a cleverly disguised bug on the Boards that keeps evading Riot's team bugfixing it because they don't care about the Boards.

If it's a boards bug then Riot needs to harvest the AI and use it in their bots.

The intermediate bots are still too easy.
Then the bots would lock in Yasuo mid, feed, and spend more time typing corny jokes in chat than actually playing the game.
Wow I'd have thought it would be older.  Mine's 4 or maybe 5 now?

The only at least semi-personal info I know about Laughing Fish is that he lives (or at least used to live) in [Florida](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/oT5TITte-yall-got-the-memes-covered-but-we-need-some-games?show=nested&comment=000100000000000000000000)

o_O

Are you his stalker san?
Can confirm. Not at a desk job though.
